children.name: mini
children.desc: short and sweet

children.name: midi
children.description: mid length, knee area to calf

attributes.name: neckline
attributes.description: shape of the dress at the neck/chest

children.name: turtle
children.desc: covered neck

children.name: collar
children.desc: folded piece at neck

children.name: jewel
children.desc: round and close to the base of the neck

children.name: scoop neck
children.desc: deep curve hits mid chest

children.name: v_neck
children.desc: v-shape, hits below neck and along chest

children.name: off_shoulder
children.desc: one edge extending below the shoulder and collarbone

children.name: sweetheart
children.desc: two connecting curves at bust

children.name: square
children.desc: 3 edges that create square-shape at a point below the neck

attributes.name: silhouette
attributes.desc: the overall shape of the dress

children.name: a_line
children.desc: fitted top, flares outward towards bottom

children.name: bodycon
children.desc: tight fitting along full length of dress

children.name: mermaid
children.desc: fitted torso to thigh/knee then flares out to hem

children.name: sheath
children.desc: fitted close to body with straight skirt, hits around knee

children.name: shift
children.desc: flares away from body, not tight fitting; short dress

attributes.name: sleeves
attributes.description: amount of coverage on the arm

children.name: one_shoulder
children.description: asymmetric with one shoulder covered, the other bare

children.name: halter_closed
children.description: bare shoulders, straps wrap around neck

children.name: halter_open
children.description: bare shoulders, straps are wide apart, wrap around neck

children.name: strapless
children.description: bare shoulders + collar; no sleeves or arm covering

children.name: strap
children.description: thin straps over the shoulder/collar; sleeveless

children.name: sleeveless
children.description: partially bare shoulders, thick straps but no sleeves on arm

children.name: short sleeve
children.description: covered shoulders and covered upper portion of upper arm

children.name: three-quarter sleeves
children.description: covered shoulders and upper arm; bare lower arm

children.name: long sleeve
children.description: Shoulders + entire length of arm is covered
